text: Bruce MacLeish Dern (born June 4, 1936) is an American actor. He was nominated for two Academy Awards, including Best Supporting Actor for Coming Home and Best Actor for Nebraska.Bruce Dern Biography (1936-)JOHN DERN, 54, UTILITY CHIEF, ATTORNEY, DIES ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Bruce Dern at the University of Wisconsin's Actors Studio audio collection * Cinema Retro's Evening with Bruce Dern at The Players, New York City Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors
title: Bruce Dern
